Package VendingModel.VendingMachineClasses

Class RegularVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingModel.VendingMachineClasses.VendingMachine
VendingModel.VendingMachineClasses.RegularVendingMachine
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceVendingMachine
public class RegularVendingMachine extends VendingMachine implements InterfaceVendingMachine
This is the RegularVendingMachine class. This class extends to the VendingMachine class and implements the InterfaceVendingMachine methods. The main process involved in this class is the buying of an item based on a given slot.

  • Field Summary
